entities.name: UC1: Transform Coffee Beans into Powder
entities.description: Transform coffee beans into powder using a crushing mill.

entities.name: UC1.1: Control Rotary Speed
entities.description: Maintain a constant rotary speed for the crushing mill.

entities.name: UC1.2: Apply First-Order Lag
entities.description: Apply a first-order lag to prevent torque peaks.

entities.name: UC1.3: Reduce Speed with Gear
entities.description: Use a speed-reducing gear to adjust the speed.

entities.name: UC1.4: Apply Rotational Spring/Damper
entities.description: Use a rotational spring/damper to manage rotational dynamics.

entities.name: UC1.5: Apply Friction Elements
entities.description: Incorporate friction elements to simulate realistic conditions.

entities.name: UC1.6: Monitor Energy Consumption
entities.description: Use an energy sensor to monitor the energy consumption of the mill.

entities.name: UC1.7: Enhance Model with Electrical Motor
entities.description: Enhance the model by including an electrical motor.

entities.name: UC1.8: Control Motor Speed
entities.description: Control the speed of the electrical motor.

entities.name: UC1.9: Monitor Motor Temperature
entities.description: Monitor the temperature of the electrical motor to account for heat generation.
